alert.note: Alert for Northwest Montgomery (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 28 at 2:25PM EST until January 31 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Virginia... Maryland... Potomac River at Little Falls affecting Central and Southeast Montgomery and Fairfax Counties. Potomac River at Edwards Ferry affecting Northwest Montgomery, Western Loudoun and Eastern Loudoun zones. Potomac River at Point of Rocks affecting Frederick MD and Western Loudoun zones. For the Potomac River...including Point of Rocks, Edwards Ferry, Little Falls...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Potomac River at Edwards Ferry. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon to early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Water reaches the boat ramp and lower parking area at Edwards Ferry, and begins to inundate areas near Whites Ferry. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:01 PM EST Sunday the stage was 10.6 feet, or 4.4 feet below flood stage. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached late Monday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information && River Name Fld Observed Sun Mon Mon Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time 7PM 1AM 7AM Stg Time Date Potomac River Edwards Ferr 15.0 10.6 Sun 2 pm 11.0 11.9 12.6 15.8 7am Tue &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/washington or www.weather.gov/baltimore. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1030 PM EST.
